page.title: 14LOCAL NEWS - AIRDRIE
page.content: THE WEEKLY NEWSPAPER COVERING OUR AREA IS THE AIRDRIE AND COATBRIDGE ADVERTISER.IT IS 30 YEARS OLD,COSTS 18 PENCE.IT COVERS MANY LOCAL STORIES,THE MOST COMMON TYPES BEING DIARY STORIES. THESE ARE STORIES WHICH MOSTLY ORIGINATE FROM COUNCIL MEETINGS AND CASES IN AIRDRIE SHERIFF COURT.THE OTHER NEWS IS GATHERED IN A VARIETY OF WAYS.SOME OF IT COMES TO THE OFFICE FROM PEOPLE WHO HAVE NEWS OF SOMETHING WHICH AFFECTS THEM OR THE AREA.IN OTHER CASES THE REPORTERS HAVE TO GO OUT AND "SNIFF OUT" THE NEWS IN PLACES LIKE PUBS WHERE PEOPLE COME TOGEHTER FOR A CHAT. THERE ARE 13 FULL TIME WORKERS AT THE PAPER FROM THE EDITOR DOWN TO AUXILIARY WORKERS.THE PAPER ITSELF IS PRINTED OUTSIDE THE AREA IN HAMILTON
